name: Eric Scout
description: Am a man that share his laughter, jokes, fun , love, understanding with my woman , i am also a romantic man who make his woman feel the taste she desire, i am God Fearing, open minded,Straight forward and Down to earth, I love to listen to variety of music, I enjoy in sharing a meaningful, intimate conversation with my partner. I believe in communication, honest, trust and respect are very important in any relationship. I am a very romantic, affectionate, sensuous and very passionate man.
